verbs.description: Kalani Goldberg , a Gilbert teen , [V: was] honored at the White House by Melania Trump in her " Be Best " speech .
[ARG1: Kalani Goldberg , a Gilbert teen ,] was [V: honored] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [ARG0: by Melania Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in her " Be Best " speech] .
Kalani Goldberg , a Gilbert teen , was honored at the White House by Melania Trump in [ARG1: her] " [V: Be] [ARG2: Best] " speech .
